entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
